xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 28 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 00:11 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 00:11 <kushalk124> hey sdumitriu 00:16 <kushalk124> sdumitriu: and marta Thanks for the help during the time. :) 01:44 <Guest22512> has joined #ccm 02:31 <Guest22512> has joined #ccm 02:50 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 04:06 <BogdanVancea1_> has joined #ccm 04:48 <kushalkhandelwal> hey BogdanVancea1_ 04:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Congratulations :) 04:48 <BogdanVancea1_> hello kushalkhandelwal 04:48 <BogdanVancea1_> thanks :) 04:49 <BogdanVancea1_> did you get accepted aswell? 04:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Nopes :( 04:49 <BogdanVancea1_> oh, sorry :( 04:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Ahh.. its ok 04:49 <kushalkhandelwal> My bad luck 04:50 <BogdanVancea1_> yeah :( 04:50 <kushalkhandelwal> So finished with your project ? 04:50 <BogdanVancea1_> diploma project? 04:50 <kushalkhandelwal> All set for working over summer ? 04:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 04:50 <BogdanVancea1_> pretty much, yeah 04:50 <BogdanVancea1_> I've managed to write a couple of papers about it aswell 04:50 <BogdanVancea1_> hoping at least one gets accepted 04:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh nice :) 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Best of luck :) 04:51 <BogdanVancea1_> thanks 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> You will surely get a paper published 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> So what plans ahead ? 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> I too have to start looking for a thesis option 04:51 <kushalkhandelwal> from 2014 04:51 <BogdanVancea1_> ;)) 04:51 <BogdanVancea1_> hehe 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> you still have time 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> I need to finish my actual thesis paper 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> but I'm hoping that will go fast 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> sincer I've got the artciles 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> articles* 04:52 <kushalkhandelwal> You did your thesis in your own university ? 04:52 <BogdanVancea1_> yup :) 04:53 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 04:53 <BogdanVancea1_> until a few years ago 04:53 <BogdanVancea1_> you could do it at other universities 04:53 <BogdanVancea1_> it was back when the CS program took 5 years 04:53 <BogdanVancea1_> and the last semester was dedicated to the thesis 04:53 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 04:53 <BogdanVancea1_> now its only 4 years and the last semester you sorta need to go to classes and work on the thesis 04:54 <BogdanVancea1_> so its easier to just choose a teacher from the 3rd year 04:54 <BogdanVancea1_> and start working on it then 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> For us in a 4year program 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> 7 semesters of regular studies 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> in which last sem is for electives 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> and remaining 1 sem 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> you can do a thesis 04:54 <kushalkhandelwal> or go for industrial training for 1 year 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> ah 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> nice 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> In my case 5 year dual degree course 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> 4 years of studies 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> and 1 year 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> can do thesis 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> I see 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> or industrial training 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> pretty cool 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> :) 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> I've did the industrial training last summer 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Yeah, so I have one more year in uni 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> then thesis 04:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Ah nice :) 04:55 <BogdanVancea1_> yeah 04:56 <BogdanVancea1_> you trying for a master? 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> Now I have to start looking for some internship for this summer 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes would try 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> would give gre next year 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> My course currently is a master integrated 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> Msc(Hons) Chemistry 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> + BE(Hons) Electronics and Instrumentation 04:56 <kushalkhandelwal> But I would switch fields 04:57 <BogdanVancea1_> ah 04:57 <BogdanVancea1_> I see 04:58 <BogdanVancea1_> and what field do you want? 05:00 <kushalkhandelwal> NLP and ML 05:01 <BogdanVancea1_> nais 05:01 <BogdanVancea1_> :D 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> You plan to masters ? 05:01 <BogdanVancea1_> yeah 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 05:01 <BogdanVancea1_> I got admitted at ETH in Zurich 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Woahhh 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> Congratulations :D 05:01 <BogdanVancea1_> thanks :) 05:01 <kushalkhandelwal> I have many of my seniors over there 05:02 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice place :) 05:02 <kushalkhandelwal> You doing masters in ? 05:02 <BogdanVancea1_> I've heard that too 05:02 <BogdanVancea1_> I'm interested in Information Systems 05:02 <kushalkhandelwal> What was your GRE score ? 05:02 <BogdanVancea1_> we don't do GRE in Romania 05:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 05:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Mostly US uni ask for GRE 05:03 <BogdanVancea1_> I think it's specific to the US 05:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes I think so 05:03 <BogdanVancea1_> I didnt have to take any exams 05:03 <BogdanVancea1_> for ETH 05:03 <kushalkhandelwal> European Uni rarely ask for 05:03 <BogdanVancea1_> just an application 05:04 <BogdanVancea1_> yup 05:04 <kushalkhandelwal> So how did you apply ? And what was the criteria for selection ? 05:04 <kushalkhandelwal> You contacted some prof over there ? 05:04 <BogdanVancea1_> there's a pretty standard admission procedure 05:05 <BogdanVancea1_> just need to fill an online application 05:05 <BogdanVancea1_> get some recommendations from some profs at your uni 05:05 <BogdanVancea1_> and send resume, cover letter, etc 05:05 <BogdanVancea1_> I've been in contact with some TA's there 05:05 <BogdanVancea1_> but that didn't influence the admission 05:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm 05:07 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 05:07 <kushalkhandelwal> You will surely have a nice time over there :) 05:07 <BogdanVancea1_> yup :) 05:08 <BogdanVancea1_> well, I'm gonna go eat something 05:08 <BogdanVancea1_> maybe I'll see you around the channel :) 05:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Ya sure 05:08 <BogdanVancea1_> later! 05:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Yup you will see me around :) 05:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Would finish the project I proposed :) 05:32 <sdumitriu> Good morning 05:33 <sdumitriu> Fantastic sunrise colors here 05:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Morning :) 05:48 <BogdanVancea1_> good morning sdumitriu 08:27 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:50 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 11:12 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 12:40 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 23:18 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm
